metadata.dc:author: Cerdán Miguel, Javier
Cerdán Santacruz, Carlos
metadata.dc:description: Rectouretral fistulas are a rare disease, but represent an important problem for the patient that suffers them and a challenge for the urologist and colorectal surgeon who has to manage them. A wide review has been performed focusing on etiopathogenic factors, diagnostic and therapeutic options including the analysis of different surgical techniques. PubMed, MEDLINE y EMBASE medical database were searched up to September 2014.
metadata.dc:subject: Cáncer de próstata
Fístulas recto-uretrales
Rectouretral fistulas
Prostatectomía
Prostatectomy
Prostate cancer
metadata.dc:title: Acquired recto-uretral fistulas: etiopathogenesis, diagnosis and therapeutic options.
